title: AI-Powered Project Management Assistant
overview: An AI assistant that helps project managers break down tasks and manage their projects more effectively.

features.name: Task Breakdown
features.description: AI-powered task breakdown that converts high-level requirements into actionable tickets

features.name: Risk Assessment
features.description: Automated risk assessment for project tasks and timelines

requirements.description: Must integrate with Linear for task management
Must use LangChain for AI orchestration
